original_text: Laban also said to Jacob, ‘Tell me how much I should pay you for your work. I will pay whatever you want.’
korean_text: 또 이르되 네 품삯을 정하라 내가 그것을 주리라

sentences.original_text: Tell me how much I should pay you
I will pay whatever you want
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 원하는 것은 무엇이든 내가 지불할게
